extendedInfo.description: Keep track of your field contacts!  Police and Security officers will love this app to store contacts they encounter in the field.  Stores useful information for law enforcement. Includes picture of subject, vehicle, physical identifiers, id cards, incidents, aliases, phones.  Send to an email address for reporting later.

reviews.comment: App has no way of searching by criteria, no gang info. Won\'t let you update info, just forces close. Not worth the money. Wish I could get a refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if it had more features like gang affiliations, picture section for tattoos or other identifiers, notes for other info like warrants.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs fix for force closeon picture upload. Needs space for other photos and ability to place photos from gallery. Also needs misc fields
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not allow me to add a photo, keeps force closing on me. Emailed the company about the issue and never got a reply...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reb260
reviews.comment: Changing opinion. Sucks. Force close pictures and other features force close Motorola Razor No support was of money time effort so forth. Beware.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NEEDS A MISC. FIELD TO TYPE INFORMATION....SUCH AS FILE # , TATTOO , OR OTHER INFORMATION....BEEN LOOKING FOR APP. LIKE THIS..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wish I could get a refund on this one!! Force close every time a picture is taken!! Useless!!! DO NOT BUY!! Moto Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It used to be good
reviews.comment: The app will not allow the photo to attach to the file. Then it will force close if you try to email. It would be useful if it worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worthless. I can\'t update info, or show the subject\'s picture.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sucks. Needs alot of work. There hasn\'t been any updates in forever. Don\'t Buy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can not upload picture, forces a close and will not accept a Letter Character in ID field
reviews.author: A Google User
